comment.author: 7278052@N06
comment._content: I remember protesting the expansion of this dump at Croton Point Park. They were trying to take away some of the baseball fields. We stood in front of the bulldozers with many other kids and their families.

comment.author: 7278052@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Croton-on-Hudson, New York, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi Libraryrivergirl,

Wow.  That is a very cool story.  It's a shame that the dump was expanded at the expense of baseball fields!  Thanks for sharing it with us.

- Jill (U.S. National Archives)
